name: MeglitinidesAllergySCT
title: Meglitinides Allergy SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Concepts that could be used to indicate an allergy to Meglitinides),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:  Meglitinides),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes at both the class and the individual drug level. Includes codes both with and without allergy context),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
